articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.title: Apple Silicon Chips to Bring Mac Computers Into iPhone Ecosystem - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Apple said Monday it would build its own chips to power its Mac computers to create a "common architecture" that allows the devices to run the same apps as those on the iPhone and iPad.
articles.content:
Apple said Monday it would build its own chips to power its Mac computers to create a "common architecture" that allows the devices to run the same apps as those on the iPhone and iPad.

articles.description: For these specs, you could just get one of those laptops and save upwards of $1500. So it begs the question: is $1000 enough "cool" for you?
